version_description: - Fixed minor errors and improved stability.
- Fixed minor errors and improved stability.

- We added Spanish and Portuguese languages.
- Fixed minor errors and improved stability.

- We are glad to introduce you the updated "Frequently Asked Questions" section. We've tried to make it very convenient, so you could find all needed information faster.
- We've added French and Chinese (simplified) localizations.
- Fixed minor errors and improved stability.

We spent a lot of time to make our app better. Most changes will be invisible for you, but the app works faster and more stable now. There are start screens for new users, that will tell you about the features of the app.

If you like our application, please give us a high rate, it inspires us.

Start using the app is easier now. We updated the first screen, it becomes more interesting and understandable. Also our talented developers have made many improvements that are not visible to the user, but influence on the rate and reliability of the app.

While the update is being installed, please take a moment and leave us a positive feedback.

We worked a lot and finally did it! We present you a new unique function: a call in silent mode. Pull a bell to the kid's phone, even if the phone is in a silent mode and the kid does not hear a call from you. A loud signal will attract kid’s attention and he will call you back.
We suggest to set up the basic watch settings for new users, while the watch’s connection.
The watch can be used immediately after connection without a long setup now!

The new version of the app fixed bugs and increased the app’s speed.

Due to your requests we quickly fixed the error with some disappeared functions. Thank you very much for being so attentive, we apologize for the inconvenience.

While the update is being installed, please take a moment and leave us a positive feedback.

Do you often deal with the situation, when your kid's phone is in silent mode and the kid doesn't answer? Try our new function - signal in silent mode! Send the sound notification to the kid even if the kid's phone is in silent mode.

If you enjoy our app, please rate us in App Store.
We fixed the issue with LIVE-minutes purchasing and critical error on iOS 9 devices.

We continue to improve our app: in this version we updated the process of watch connection, it became more understandable and faster.

We also fixed small bugs and increased the stability of the app.

Install the new version of the Find my kids app. We are sure that you will like it, because we created a new and incredibly simple interface for the kid's phone. Your kid will be able to send a message to the chat with just one click, it's so easy now! The new screen has a big SOS button, but we hope it will never come useful.

Send your hearts to the kid directly to the phone and accompany them with a short messages, it is an interesting way to scold or praise the kid.
Fixed minor errors and improved stability.
Fixed minor errors and improved stability.

We worked a lot and finally did it! We present you a new unique function: a call in silent mode. Pull a bell to the kid's phone, even if the phone is in a silent mode and the kid does not hear a call from you. A loud signal will attract kid’s attention and he will call you back.
We suggest to set up the basic watch settings for new users, while the watch’s connection.
The watch can be used immediately after connection without a long setup now!

The new version of the app fixed bugs and increased the app’s speed.

We are glad to present you the long-awaited update of the Find my kids app. We made significant enhancements such as:
- a new chat with the opportunity to send funny stickers for parents and children, our stickers are also available for iMessage.
- the process of connection with kid's phone became easier and faster.
- we have made a lot of invisible changes, due to which the app will work better and more stable.

In new version of the application, we made a lot of invisible at first sight, but very important changes. Find my kids will work safer and faster now. We also edited the Help section. While the application is being updated, please leave us a positive feedback.

If you have any difficulties or questions about the application, we are always happy to help you in the support chat.

In this version we fixed some issues in our app that was found in previous release. Sorry for this inconvenience.

In previous version of the application, we made a lot of invisible at first sight, but very important changes. Find my kids will work safer and faster now. We also edited the Help section. While the application is being updated, please leave us a positive feedback.

If you have any difficulties or questions about the application, we are always happy to help you in the support chat.

We read all your comments and make the application better every day. In this version we improved geolocation, also we fixed errors in other functions, improved translations into some languages. If you like our application, please give us a good rate.

We read all your comments and make the application better every day. In this version we improved geolocation, also we fixed errors in other functions, improved translations into some languages. If you like our application, please give us a good rate.

We are happy to introduce the long-awaited update of our application. In the new version we have updated the recording and listening function, now you can save the recordings to your device, we also improved the quality of the listening.
The new version of the application is adapted for the right-to-left languages, the Arabic and Hebrew are available now.
While the update is being installed, please give us a good rate.

The new version of the application is adapted for the right-to-left languages, the Arabic and Hebrew are available now.
While the update is being installed, please give us a good rate.

While the update is being installed, please give us a good rate.

In this update we have made several improvements that aren't visible at first sight, but the application will work faster and better.

While the application is updating, please give us a good rate.

In the new version we improved the quality of the application functions. While the update is being updated, please give us a good rate.
In the new version we improved the quality of the application functions. While the update is being updated, please give us a good rate.
We have improved the quality of the app’s functions in the new version. While the app is being updated, please rate our app for 5 stars.
We have improved the quality of the app’s functions in the new version. While the app is being updated, please rate our app for 5 stars.

We updated the information on the About app screen for users, who have a subscription with watch, the information about activation will be shown correctly in the new version . We also improved the work of the application with the Internet, maybe you will not notice it, but the app will work a little faster, and if the Internet suddenly disappears, we will show it at the top of the screen.

Join our community on Facebook, tell us about your approaches to raising children, take part in researches and giveaways, communicate with other parents, who also take care about their children. You can find our Facebook page by request «Find My Kids».

We have added a convenient way to switch the map types in new version. You can select a more detailed map in your region (Apple, Google or OSM) on the screen of child’s profile. When you click on the child's foto on the map, you can appraise the accuracy of geolocation - each feedback helps us to make the service better. You can find our Facebook page by request «Find My Kids» and leave your comments.

We continue improving our application, therefore, the event feed was updated in the new version. Now it contains not only information about entering and leaving safe areas, but also information about the use of games and applications. We are going to develop it further by filling it with new events and interesting content
In this update the ability to scan the REG-code while connecting the GPS-watch is added and some bugs are fixed

In this version, we updated the app's usage statistics. Now, you can see how much time your children play games or use social networks while they are at school and how much time they spend on apps at home in their free time
Bugs have been fixed, improvements to the service were made.
Our application has been sped up a bit and has become more accurate and stable. We got rid of certain mistakes in order to ensure the safety of your children.
We added translations to several languages, worked on maps scaling, displaying the kid’s position in the list of children and corrected several bugs in the new version.
Sometimes an update is just an update. The changes did not affect the interface, but the stability of the application has increased.
We fixed small bugs which occasionally interfered with the app. We hope that you never had to deal with them!
Sometimes an update is just an update. The changes did not affect the interface, but the stability of the application has increased.

"We have improved the quality of the app’s functions in the new version.

We have added a convenient way to switch the map types in new version. You can select a more detailed map in your region (Apple, Google or OSM) on the screen of child’s profile. When you click on the child's foto on the map, you can appraise the accuracy of geolocation - each feedback helps us to make the service better.

While the app is being updated, please rate our app for 5 stars."

We added the opportunity to use a bluetooth headset, solved problems with activating the subscriptions and had upgraded user agreements in the new version.

While the app is being updated, please rate our app for 5 stars.

In the new version, we optimized the speed of maps' loading and translated the application into Hungarian, Lithuanian, Swedish, Dutch, Finnish, Bulgarian, Serbian and Portuguese-Brazilian.

Starting with this version, the recording of the sounds around the child and live-listening are no longer available if the child has iOS. We disabled this feature due to Apple’s request, as it can be used for spying.
This interesting release includes: bug fixes.
Our application has been sped up a bit and has become more accurate and stable. We got rid of certain mistakes in order to ensure the safety of your children.
We fixed small bugs which occasionally interfered with the app. We hope that you never had to deal with them!
Sometimes an update is just an update. The changes did not affect the interface, but the stability of the application has increased.

We fixed a number of errors you reported to us.
We fixed small bugs which occasionally interfered with the app. We hope that you never had to deal with them!
The possible charge consumption in the background process is fixed.
The possible charge consumption in the background process is fixed.

In this version, we updated the app's usage statistics. Now, you can see how much time your children play games or use social networks while they are at school and how much time they spend on apps at home in their free time

Install the updated version of the "Find My Kids" app and verify your email in the app settings. Via the email you will be able you will be able to log in to the web-version of the "Find My Kids" app when you are at work or at home with access to a computer.
And we also reduced the size of the application, now your phone will have more space for family photos and your favorite music.

Install the updated version of the "Find My Kids" app and verify your email in the app settings. Via the email you will be able you will be able to log in to the web-version of the "Find My Kids" app when you are at work or at home with access to a computer.
And we also reduced the size of the application, now your phone will have more space for family photos and your favorite music.
In the new version of the application, access to the history of your child’s movements has become easier by having the last 3 hours on the main screen.

In this version, we have improved the chat. Update the application, go into the chat and write something nice for your child!  In the previous version, access to the history of movements has become easier, now parents can see their child’s route for the last three hours on the main screen

We continue improving our application, therefore, the event feed was updated in the new version. Now it contains not only information about  entering and leaving safe areas, about use of games and applications, but also information about places visited during the day. We are going to develop it further by filling it with new events and interesting content.
We continue improving our application so updated screen with a list of children is waiting for you in the new version. Also we fixed a possible problem when connecting a watch with a changed password

In the new version of our application possible problems with history of moving opening have been solved. Also we made some changes in subscription management section. Now you have full information about app data and your subscriptions in one section.  You can easily cancel, restore or buy subscriptions.

We continue improving our app, therefore, critical notifications were added in the new version. It will allow to hear SOS and loud signal even in silent mode. You can turn notifications on and off in the phone settings for this application: select a notification item and enable permission for important alerts.
Now we have shortcuts for some functions. Press and hold the app icon to use it

The process of connecting child's watch has become easier and clearer, now there is no need to send a text message to the watch to set it. And if there are any difficulties, you can always contact us in the support chat.

Just click "Update" and you will immediately see the change in the home screen. The location history is now displayed in a separate button. We have also updated its interface: now it is clearer, more concise and informative.

We strive to keep the application stable and reliable, so we regularly update it. For your convenience, you can now answer a loud signal with a quick message and we also have shortcuts for some functions. Press and hold the app icon to use it.
Stability and performance have been improved, several bugs have been fixed.
Now for your convenience all the created locations are marked on the map, so that it's easier and quicker to find where your child is.
